com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.compute.util

Class AbstractComputeProvider<R extends ComputeInstance<T>,T extends ComputeInstanceTemplate>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractConfigured
      • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider.util.AbstractResourceProvider<R,T>
        • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider.util.AbstractInstanceProvider<R,T>
          • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.compute.util.AbstractComputeProvider<R,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of the resource that can be created by this provider
    T - type of the template needed to create resources
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComputeProvider<R,T>, Configured, InstanceProvider<R,T>, ResourceProvider<R,T>

    public abstract class AbstractComputeProvider<R extends ComputeInstance<T>,T extends ComputeInstanceTemplate>
extends AbstractInstanceProvider<R,T>
implements ComputeProvider<R,T>
    Abstract base class for compute provider implementations.
